data.name: ZHP: Unlosing Ranger vs. Darkdeath Evilman - Digital Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Training to be the worlds greatest hero is a breeze when you’ve got the beats of ZHP: Unlosing Ranger vs. Darkdeath Evilman to keep you strong! Download the digital soundtrack and power your way to the top with all these bops!

01 - End of the World.mp3
02 - Darkdeath Evilman.mp3
03 - A Ray of Hope.mp3
04 - Cataclysmic Ravine.mp3
05 - Burn Up, Unlosing Ranger!.mp3
06 - Hero Modification Project.mp3
07 - Victory Brings a Big Bonus.mp3
08 - Unlosing Ranger, GO!.mp3
09 - Castle of Ultimate Regret.mp3
10 - Frontier of Ice.mp3
11 - Last Battle.mp3
12 - Last Last Battle!.mp3
13 - Fool's Paradise.mp3
14 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Ranger Ver..mp3
15 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Galaxy Magical Girl Ver..mp3
16 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Freakish Creature Ver..mp3
17 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Fantasy RPG Ver..mp3
18 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Junk Mech Ver..mp3
19 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Super Robot Ver..mp3
20 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Asia in the Eyes of Westerners Ver..mp3
21 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Dark Hero Ver..mp3
22 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Animal Ver..mp3
23 - Unlosing Ranger's Theme Song, Last Boss Ver..mp3
24 - Absolute Hero.mp3
25 - Sign of Courage.mp3
26 - L'Amour Etranger.mp3
27 - Last Battle -Toy Ver.-.mp3
